messages.content: ComfyUI Discopixel Nodes is a small collection of custom nodes for use with ComfyUI, created by Discopixel.
Which node is available in the ComfyUI Discopixel Nodes collection?
The Transform Template onto Face Mask node is available in the ComfyUI Discopixel Nodes collection.
What does the Transform Template onto Face Mask node do?
The Transform Template onto Face Mask node takes a template and a face mask as inputs, and transforms the template to fit over the face by calculating the centroid and eigenvectors of the face.
What is the assumed format of the face mask shape in the Transform Template onto Face Mask node?
The Transform Template onto Face Mask node assumes there is only one shape in the face mask, and that the shape is comprised of white pixels over a black background.
How can you install the ComfyUI Discopixel Nodes?

To install the ComfyUI Discopixel Nodes, first clone the repo into your ComfyUI extensions directory using the command: `git clone https://github.com/discopixel-studio/comfyui-discopixel`. Then, install the dependencies using the command: `pip3 install -r requirements.txt`.
What should you do after installing the ComfyUI Discopixel Nodes to start using them?
After installing the ComfyUI Discopixel Nodes, you should restart ComfyUI to start using them.
In which directory should you clone the ComfyUI Discopixel Nodes repo?
You should clone the ComfyUI Discopixel Nodes repo into the `ComfyUI/custom_nodes` directory.
